description.english: Defeat the Worm Boss without defeating any Small Worms.

description.spanish: Derrota al jefe gusano sin derrotar a ningún gusano pequeño.

description.russian: Победите великого червя, не победив ни одного малого червя.

description.english: Successfully complete all of the quests given by the Elves of Faynore.

description.english: Reach the end of the High Rift without dying.
description.german: Erreiche das Ende des Hohen Rifts, ohne zu sterben.
description.french: Atteignez la fin de la Faille supérieure sans mourir.
description.italian: Raggiungi la fine di Varco Superiore senza morire.
description.koreana: 죽지 않고 높은 틈새의 끝에 도달하기.
description.spanish: Llega al final del acantilado superior sin morir.
description.schinese: 在未死亡的情况下到达高级裂谷的终点。
description.russian: Дойдите до конца высокого рифта, не умерев.
description.thai: ไปถึงปลายทางรอยแยกมิติชั้นบนโดยไม่ตาย
description.japanese: 死なずにハイリフトまでたどり着く
description.polish: Dotrzyj do końca Górnej Rozpadliny, nie umierając ani razu.
description.norwegian: Nå slutten av den Øvre kløften uten å dø.
description.swedish: Nå slutet av den Övre passagen utan att dö.
description.czech: Dosáhni na konec Vyšší trhliny bez jediného úmrtí.
description.brazilian: Chegue ao final da Fenda Alta sem morrer.

displayName.thai: เนลลี่จอมจุ้น

description.english: Find ALL secret chests in the High Rift.
description.german: Finde ALLE geheimen Truhen im Hohen Rift.
description.french: Trouvez TOUS les coffres secrets dans la Faille supérieure.
description.italian: Trova TUTTI i forzieri segreti in Varco Superiore.
description.koreana: 높은 틈새에 있는 모든 비밀 상자 발견하기.
description.spanish: Encuentra TODOS los cofres secretos del acantilado superior.
description.schinese: 找到高级裂谷的所有秘密宝箱。
description.russian: Найдите ВСЕ тайные сундуки в высоком рифте.
description.thai: ค้นหาหีบลับทั้งหมดในรอยแยกมิติชั้นบนให้ครบ

description.norwegian: Finn ALLE de hemmelige kistene i den Øvre kløften.
description.swedish: Hitta ALLA hemliga kistor i den Övre passagen.
description.czech: Najdi ve Vyšší trhlině VŠECHNY tajné truhly.
description.turkish: Yüksek Yarık'taki TÜM gizli sandıkları bul.
description.brazilian: Encontre TODOS os baús secretos na Fenda Alta.
